name: treasure_vault_pixi_8
description: Treasure Vault mini game written in TypeScript and utilizing PIXI v.8

scripts.build: npm run check-install && npx webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.dev: npm run check-install && npx webpack --config webpack.dev.js && npm run serve
scripts.start: npm run dev && npm run serve

author: Noncho Savov
